title: The River
occurrences: about growing up on the banks of a wide river.
and the flavor of the people who live by the river...
The river had its own life-
Along the river were villages and people living and working...
ln the dry season, when the river was low...
Then, as the river brought everything...
a stone, a river.
Made of clay taken from the river...
On the river and on its banks...
Arisen from the bed of the river, Kali returns to the river.
He wandered along the river...
"Big river, big river.
And in my river there are pearls."
"The river runs, the round world spins.
l wanted to write more and more- everything about the river.
how people depended on the river spiritually as well as physically-
river people and village people-
howjute workers cooled off in the river after a hard day...
learning the wisdom of lndia on the banks of the river.
to the calm, purifying waters of the river.
And as the steps were punctuating the banks of the river...
a young wife went with her mother to the river...
She also had her river...
and like the river, her life flowed on and on...
And the young wife went with her mother to the river...
the big river, the whole world and everything.
The river runs, the round world spins.
